title: Who Controls AI? Trump Order Ignites National Fight
description: President Donald Trump’s executive order on artificial intelligence intensifies a national debate over federal authority, state protections, Big Tech influence, and political bias in AI systems.
content:
As states like Florida flexes its muscles to protect its citizenry from the dark side of artificial intelligence, a fierce debate rages: Who really holds the reins on the future of AI?

title: ‘Affordable AI for every Indian’: Mukesh Ambani unveils Reliance blueprint to transform Indian economy, society

title: Robots and Artificial Intelligence could transform future of farming, says expert
description: In the near future the sight of robots trundling through rural fields could be as familiar as that of combine harvesters and tractors, according to Professor Gerry Lacey.
content:
